1.title: Timeless Bark
1.short_description: Evokes natural resilience and enduring beauty.
1.description: Raw, monochromatic texture that anchors your space in lasting calm and quiet strength.

2.title: Quiet Resolve
2.short_description: Emphasizes inner strength and peaceful determination.
2.description: A study in contrast and solitude. The figure stands resilient against a dark background.

3.title: Ethereal Swirl
3.short_description: Focuses on the dreamy, almost ghostly quality of movement.
3.description: Soft strokes and blending colors create a sense of motion.

4.title: Urban Solitude
4.short_description: The silence of the city at dawn.
4.description: Capturing the moments before the city wakes up.
